/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These buildings, predominantly white and gray, are punctuated with occasional red and green accents, adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, providing a green canopy over the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life.
